ClassDesc: See @B_android#hardware#biometrics#BiometricPrompt#AuthenticationCallback_E@ Callback structure provided to @B_android#hardware#fingerprint#FingerprintManager#authenticate_E@. Users of @B_android#hardware#fingerprint#FingerprintManager#authenticate_E@ must provide an implementation of this for listening to fingerprint events.
